description: Location We provide clean and cozy toilets for kids, which located on L2 floor.

Location ATM Center is provided for banking services and transactions.

Location To allow our shoppers fulfill their religious obligation while shopping, Central Park provides Musholla Executive on Lower Ground (behind Hoka-Hoka Bento Restaurant) and also Musholla for employees and drivers on basement parking on Lower Ground Mezzanine & P8 Floor.
Location Provided for parents who need to take care of their babiesâ€™ needs, we provide Nursery Room on every floor near SOGO Department Store.

Location Customers do not need to worry about looking for parking and we provide valet parking that is easily available and accessible, located at Lumina Lobby, Laguna Lobby & Lower Ground Mezzanine Floor (near the Disabled Parking area).

Location The Charging Hub for your gadgets is available for complimentary charging, located in East Area Ground Floor corridors, Upper Ground, 1 Floor, 2 Floor and 3 Floor. GF, UG, L1, L2, and L3 Floor
Location We provide wheelchair at the Lumina Info Desk, Ground Floor, for those in need of mobility convenience while enjoying shopping at Central Park.
Location We provide clean and cozy toilets for our customers
Location Car Call service are available for your convenience to call your driver after enjoying your wonderful shopping time at Central Park. Available at Lumina Lobby, Ground Floor.
Location Elevators are provided for our customers, especially for our senior customers and customers with baby strollers and wheelchairs.
Location To provide our customers then comfort when not carrying their own vehicle, we provide a drop & pick up taxi station located at Laguna Lobby
